Text: The Dubrovnik Summer Festival (Croatian: "Dubrovačke ljetne igre" ; ] is an annually-held summer festival instituted in 1950 in Dubrovnik, Croatia.
Triplets:<The Dubrovnik Summer Festival
1:
--------------------
Text: Dubrovnik Summer Festival:  It is held every year between 10 July and 25 August.
Triplets:<Dubrovnik Summer Festival
